definition: to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

sentences.english: The outer circle of the thermal fuse is riveted with a copper sleeve.
sentences.chinese: 熱熔斷器的外圓上鉚接有銅套。

sentences.english: The testing board is equipped with switches, fuses, pilot amps and so on.
sentences.chinese: 試驗屏上有開關，熔斷器，指示燈等。

sentences.english: This client began with and focused on the development and production of fuses .
sentences.chinese: 這家公司始於並一直致力於熔斷器產品的研發和生產。

sentences.english: Do not replace fuses when standing on a moist floor.
sentences.chinese: 不要站在潮溼地板上調換熔斷器。

sentences.english: In this paper, the requirement of 280℃ temperature melting breaker used in fireproofvalves have been described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了高層建築防火閥對280℃溫度熔斷器的要求。

sentences.english: Links must be permanent, active and NEVER expire.
sentences.chinese: 熔斷體必須是永久的，積極，永不過期。

sentences.english: The thesis makes some theoretical research on fusing of opper wire.
sentences.chinese: 文章對銅絲通電熔化熔斷進行了理論上的一些研究。

sentences.english: Outages are usually caused by the fault induced operation of circuit breakers or fuses.
sentences.chinese: 斷電通常由故障引起斷路器或熔斷器動作造成的。
內裝QSA系列熔斷式隔離開關。

sentences.english: Details were given by RR of what we would expect be used for the switch fuses .
sentences.chinese: 羅羅提供用作開關熔斷器的詳細資料。

sentences.english: The distribution of fuse is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了熔斷器佈置的有效性。

sentences.english: I've blown the fuse in the fuse box over and over again.
sentences.chinese: 我把保險盒裏的保險絲一再熔斷。

sentences.english: Chokes are copper wound and fuse protected.
sentences.chinese: 扼流圈是全銅環繞的，並有熔斷器保護。

sentences.english: Do not touch the fuse when it is in working condition.
sentences.chinese: 熔斷電阻器工作時不可觸摸，否則有人身傷害的危險。

sentences.english: Analyses the phenomena of current-limiting fuse under breaking short-circuit current.
sentences.chinese: 分析了限流熔斷器在開斷短路電流過程中的物理現象。

sentences.english: The fuse blew out with a snap.
sentences.chinese: 系統熔絲又一次熔斷了嗎？

definition: subprime mortgage crisis/abbr. for 次級房屋信貸危機|次级房屋信贷危机[ci4 ji2 fang2 wu1 xin4 dai4 wei1 ji1]
(of a stock price or market index) currently higher than at the previous day's close
